name: Introduction to Statistics
description: This course introduces statistical concepts and methods, including probability distributions, sampling, estimation, and hypothesis testing.

name: Calculus
description: This course covers the fundamentals of single-variable and multivariable calculus.

name: Linear Algebra
description: This course focuses on linear systems, vector spaces, and matrices.

name: Advanced Calculus
description: This course covers topics in multivariable calculus, including vector-valued functions, partial derivatives, and multiple integrals.

name: Probability Theory
description: This course covers the fundamentals of probability theory, including probability distributions, random variables, and conditional probability.

name: Statistical Methods
description: This course covers statistical methods, including linear regression, time-series analysis, and experimental design.

name: Bayesian Statistics
description: This course covers Bayesian statistics, including Bayesian inference, prior distributions, and posterior distributions.
